TopicTitle: Kerbin City Community Project - Phase B - New Islands

Articles.Content:
A Sims 3 parody, anyone? I love that game too much to shut up about it

@Cooly No offense, but i feel that Human Space Program box could be much better. Maybe use a PC box template?

Yeah, it doesn't say "not final" for nothing.

Nothke, are you planning on streaming again today?

I have made a website with google sites. It's still under construction, but I have already something.

If you want to see it, click here

I have made a website with google sites. It's still under construction, but I have already something.

If you want to see it, click here

Oh my God.. That was really a joke that we need a website! In my opinion it's too much work to edit a website. If you want to edit and update that'll be ok, but I actually doubt how useful it would be.

Oh my God.. That was really a joke that we need a website! In my opinion it's too much work to edit a website. If you want to edit and update that'll be ok, but I actually doubt how useful it would be.

I want to manage it, no problem with it.

Let's see how useful it will be, I just have to click the DELETE button.
Can all the devs have a spot to post up stuff?
That would be a nice idea, give us all a way to show what we are doing easily.

If they want to post on the site, they must have a Google+ account

EDIT: If I give someone the "edit" rights, they can delete pages, add some, change text

Edited August 25, 2013 by Olympic1

EDIT: If I give someone the "edit" rights, they can delete pages, add some, change text

Never mind, fixed it. So if you want to post you're progress on the site and you have a Google account, then sent me you're gmail in a PM and I invite you to the site so you can post.

I'll be online soon again:

http://www.ustream.tv/channel/3d-modeling-iss

sorry if I disappeared yesterday, the computer was lagging and my chat dissapeared completely, then something happened with my ustream account I couldn't get in.. So I stopped trying.

Alright

The slightly revamped Minecrash case.

And the one everyone's been waiting for...

It couldn't be anything other than...

Human Space Program

(not final)

-snigger snigger- I think I want to make a Kerbsoft HQ...

I'll be online soon again:

http://www.ustream.tv/channel/3d-modeling-iss

sorry if I disappeared yesterday, the computer was lagging and my chat dissapeared completely, then something happened with my ustream account I couldn't get in.. So I stopped trying.

now on twitch:

http://www.twitch.tv/nothke

I watched a little. It is interesting

Eager to test
He's streaming now
I'm currently makeing a KIRT - Kerbal Institute of Rocket Technology campus. A subsidairy of KIT.

I'm currently makeing a KIRT - Kerbal Institute of Rocket Technology campus. A subsidairy of KIT.

Hay, I am intending to dedicate a full island to the campus (the small one West of the 'downtown' island on the sketch map). I wanted to base it of MIT too and call it KIT =) I think that the old English style campus that you are intending to make would fit perfectly. Also, I'd like to make a Kresge auditorium lookalike to go inside the campus.

EDIT: Oh wait.. I don't know if you are the one who wanted to make an English-like University, but somebody said that and I can't find it! God, this is confusing

Also, Frogbull has joined the project and is improving his statue of Kiberty =)

Edited August 26, 2013 by nothke
I'm the one interested in making an English-like college campus.

EDIT: Oh wait.. I don't know if you are the one who wanted to make an English-like University, but somebody said that and I can't find it! God, this is confusing

That was deadshot462, but he was just giving some ideas. > Post <

Also, Frogbull has joined the project and is improving his statue of Kiberty =)

That's awesome

I'm hoping to make a simplified version of this for a major station.

I came up it for simcity many years ago, but was never able to make it.

These were sketches for the main facade.

Did make the track alignment in railsim though.

What I do with it depends on how many platforms, and what track alignments are.

Speaking of rails, it'd be good to come up with a track standard for both this, and the modular rails I'm hoping to make. We should discuss that on its thread sometime.

Edited August 26, 2013 by Tw1
I'd like to have a plot on the future island, just a small-ish one to build some skyscrapers for the STDC HQ.

I'd like to have a plot on the future island, just a small-ish one to build some skyscrapers for the STDC HQ.

nothke will add you to the list
Im not gonna be able to work on my model, but ill still watch. Please reserve KIT for my creation.

Im not gonna be able to work on my model, but ill still watch. Please reserve KIT for my creation.

We'll do, no worry's

So, the first build is ready and packed... Should we make some groundbreaking* party?

* groundbreaking, not as in "mindblowing" but as "launching a ship" but for buildings

So, the first build is ready and packed... Should we make some groundbreaking* party?

* groundbreaking, not as in "mindblowing" but as "launching a ship" but for buildings

Yeah, let's do it !!!!!!!!
